name: photos
description: Main orchestrator agent for the Photos application. Manages user interactions and delegates to specialized agents for storage, search, editing, and account management.

skills.name: Process Request
skills.description: Handle a natural language request from the user regarding their photo library.
examples: Find all my photos of cats
Edit the last photo to be black and white

skills.name: Search Request
examples: Search for photos of my cats
Show me the shared album from Albuquerque
Show me pictures from last week

skills.name: Edit Request
skills.description: Edit photos using a variety of techniques
